name: Buffalo Chicken Bacon Quesadillas
ingredients: 40 oz raw boneless skinless chicken breast
½ cup bacon bits or cooked crumbled bacon
2 cups fat-free cottage cheese (for buffalo sauce)
6 oz reduced-fat cream cheese (for buffalo sauce)
½ cup buffalo sauce (for buffalo sauce)
½ cup fat-free milk (for buffalo sauce)
½ tsp black pepper (for buffalo sauce)
instructions: Add raw chicken, ½ cup buffalo sauce, garlic salt, black pepper, onion powder, and 2 Tbsp ranch seasoning to a slow cooker
Cook on HIGH 2-3 hours or LOW 5-6 hours until shreddable
Shred chicken in the pot with two forks
Blend cottage cheese, cream cheese, ½ cup buffalo sauce, milk, and black pepper until smooth for the buffalo sauce
Pour sauce into slow cooker; add most of the bacon bits and chives (save a little for topping); mix everything
On one half of a tortilla: add ~⅓ cup mozzarella → heaping ¾ cup buffalo chicken mix → another ~⅓ cup mozzarella + extra bacon/chives → fold over
Cook in nonstick pan over medium heat 3-4 min per side until golden and melty (or air-fry 375°F for 7-9 min, flip once)
Wrap in foil for meal prep and freeze
